description:
We are Heidari Law Group, PC, a top-level personal injury law office in Irvine, California. We have three additional locations from Los Angeles to Las Vegas, with attorneys licensed to practice in multiple jurisdictions.

Knowledgeable lawyers

Our team has the experience and knowledge necessary to tackle even the most complex personal injury cases. These include claims against large corporations, bad-faith insurance cases, aviation accidents, medical malpractice and product liability. Many other attorneys refer tough suits to us.

We are also adept at securing maximum compensation for more straightforward disputes. Recovering from injuries in California is costly, and our goal is to get our clients what they truly deserve.

Many practice areas

Our law office handles all types of injury cases, including those that involve federal courts. Examples include premises liability, truck accidents, animal bites, wrongful death and brain injury. We also handle certain types of employment and labor law, such as sexual harassment, wage-and-hour claims, discrimination and wrongful termination.

Compassionate team

Our goal is to get the best possible result on behalf of our clients. To do this, we believe communication is important. We listen to what our clients have to say, form specific strategies to meet their goals and follow through until we get what they deserve.

Free consultations

Our law office aims to make personal injury representation completely accessible. Heidari Law Group, PC, does not charge any upfront attorney fees. We offer free consultations, including virtual appointments. We also have flexible credit-card payment options.
